hey guys, if you want to download fast, download the other sections/parts as well as the 7 gig file and then replace the completed sections with the incomplete files of the 7 gig files this way you will be half way done and faster download.

ex: download the leg_shoulder, chest_arms, biceps_back  whatever that available individually.  after finish just move to the download folder where your 7 gigs files are and replace the incomplete
